website_summaries.verdict: Made with raw dandelion root, which strengthens your immune system and helps your liver quickly eliminate toxins.
pros: Rich in vitamins and minerals to help immune system
promotes sustained focus and energy.Promotes healthy digestion
Contains essential fatty acids, antioxidants, and phytonutrients that reduce inflammation
Flavored with cinnamon and hibiscus for blood pressure and blood sugar
cons: Tea bags may not be sealed well, so open with caution

customer_reviews.title: Great for DETOXING
customer_reviews.text: I was having trouble with my kidneys and urinating. After an internet search I came up with a drink that included Dandelion Root Tea, Cranberry juice, Water (500 ml each) and the juice of one Lemon. It works FANTASTIC. It is also very refreshing, (I drink it cold).Make sure you allow the tea too seep for 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: rjwjr09

customer_reviews.title: Ive never believed in teas and detox anything but this ...
customer_reviews.text: Ive never believed in teas and detox anything but this tea defiantly works after one week of drilling this tea 3x per day I noticed a significant difference not only clearing up my skin from break outs but also it has helped with my IBS-C. It not a laxative but with clean eating and healthy diet it does aid my IBS symptoms since I cant afford the $400 cost of IBS med. This tea does work
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Dandelions, I always suspected!
customer_reviews.text: Time will tell if it has anti-cancer qualities but what the heck, I will give it a try! Wouldn't it be fitting for God to provide his children with a cure free to the world. I used to have this thought every spring as I admired the tenaciousness and persistency of dandelions shortly after cutting the lawn. The irony is amazing if it turns out to help cancer in any way.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Woolston

customer_reviews.title: I love tea!
customer_reviews.text: I love tea!! i have been on antibotics off and on for the last 6 years and need all the help I can get. I was passing alot of gas. I drank this tea for only a few days and about fell over when i realized how silent my body was becoming. I have more energy. This tea taste really fine but I have so much tea that i have been mixing it with other herb teas. Have a rainbow tea day!
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: I heard that dandelion root kills cancer cells. I have heard that so many different things kill cancer over the 6 years I have been fighting to keep mine at bay. But now I am at the end of things so decided it could not hurt and ordered this tea. I do not yet know if it is going to do me any good as far as my cancer is concerned but it certainly does taste good! A perfectly wonderful cup of tea every afternoon. And it's organic!
customer_reviews.author: C. Berfield

customer_reviews.title: Bag rips half the time
customer_reviews.text: As long as the bag doesn’t rip open, it’s a great experience, great tea, great flavor. But no matter how carefully and slowly I open the individual bag, it’s a 50-50 chance that the tea bag itself will rip open. I’ve tried flapping it vigorously to get the bag inside to move to the bottom, but with limited success. Then I have to tie it tightly or staple it shut (and steeping staples in hot water hardly seems healthy). Frustrating. Not worth the hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Certainly Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Happy with Amazon but not happy with KissMeOrganics
customer_reviews.text: After purchasing this product and having it delivered by Amazon in pristine condition I contacted the manufacturer because 9 out of 10 times I opened one of the tea bags it was all over my counter because the tea bag itself was not sealed all the was around. They told me to contact Amazon that it was a shipping issue and when I explained that it was a manufacturing issue they did not reply again. I carefully open each one so that I am positive I have not torn the bag and it looks fine but there will almost always be a small area that wasn’t sealed. They seemed uninterested to accept any responsibility in this matter
customer_reviews.author: jerri

customer_reviews.title: The real deal, great for your liver and kidneys
customer_reviews.text: Great tea. pretty strong flavor and very aromatic. So much better than the crap they sell at the drugstore, this is real dandelion root, and at a reasonable price per cup. My only problem is that I sometimes break the tea bag on accident, and have to filter the tea out. But thats better than drinking tea that has a bag made of carcinogenic materials. Recommended
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: It's all in the steeping
customer_reviews.text: I didn't hold out a lot of hope for this tea. Having tasted dandelion tea in the past, I found it not so tasty but it is good for you so why not try this one. Many of the reviews said it was tasteless and colorless so I boiled my water and read the instructions to steep 5-10 minutes. I did cover the cup and leave it for 10 minutes. To my surprise I now had a cup of dark robust tea not unlike my beloved black teas and the taste was quite good. The cinnamon really stood out and added that extra spark. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Spike's mom

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money. Unusable as tea bags.
customer_reviews.text: It's no wonder this seller doesn't offer returns. I didn't check all of the tea bags in the box of 20 but the ones I checked aren't manufactured right. They're cut crooked and therefore a hole in the side of the bag is left for the leaves to fall out. Unusable as tea bags. Would not suggest a purchase. Useless. $8.39 down the drain. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Its good stuff, I take it for cancer
customer_reviews.text: Its good stuff, I take it for cancer, but got sick of the flavor really quickly and now take the capsules instead as they have no tastes and I'm not drinking this for flavor. Nothing wrong with it, but when you have cancer many things tastes horrible that normally wouldn't to me, so maybe this is one of those things.
customer_reviews.author: D and L Co

customer_reviews.title: Not good at all
customer_reviews.text: Bleh. Not good at all, certainly not the dandelion root taste that I love and expected when I purchased. I question the authenticity of this product, as well as it's "organic" claim, since each box of tea that came has a sticker on it, covering up a type-o underneath where the word "cinnamon" is misspelled. Definitely trying to start a return now.
customer_reviews.author: Faith'n Hope

customer_reviews.title: Great tea
customer_reviews.text: I read Dandelion teas was good for your digestion so I wanted to try it. The ea has a great flavor. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine L Minier

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed in this tea. In large letters, the box reads Organic Dandelion Root Tea. Same as the description. The box arrives and that's when I see it has Hibiscus and Cinnamon. I know I should have taken more time to read on as I am sure it is stated,and it is in small print on the box but I found that to be deceptive. As for the taste, I love Dandelion tea, this does not taste anything like Dandelion tea, it is red (from the Hibiscus flower), not black and you can only taste the Hibiscus with a hint of Cinnamon. I wish I was able to return this as it was a huge disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: eric c.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible tea bags!
customer_reviews.text: So far, out of 5 tea bags opened, 5 of them were improperly sealed, resulting in the whole thing bursting open in the cup. Also, 3 out of those 5 tea bags lost their strings, making it difficult to remove the flaccid, empty bag from the cup. The tea is ground too finely to strain out completely so you wind up with a very unpleasant cuppa with nasty bits floating in it.
customer_reviews.author: Thistle

customer_reviews.title: Sellers professionalism is impeccable!  Will buy again!
customer_reviews.text: I have to say I initially had an issue with this brands packaging (that was my only issue). I posted a not do nice review due to the incovnience it caused. The seller was SO incredibly professional and SO persistent on making right by its product that I had to update this review. So often sellers have zero integrity these days, that is not the case here. I truly enjoy the product, the sellers professionalism was impeccable and I feel they heard my concerns. I will absolutely make this my Go-To dandelion tea of choice moving forward!
customer_reviews.author: LR

customer_reviews.title: I like that the tea is organic and the dandelion is ...
customer_reviews.text: I like that the tea is organic and the dandelion is raw. This tea is mild and slightly sweet. I cut open the bag and add it to 1 1/4 cup hot water and 2 tbsp chia seeds for a nice after dinner health drink. It adds just enough flavor to my chia seeds to make it more pleasurable to drink, and I hope I am getting some nice health benefits for my liver and kidneys.
customer_reviews.author: luckyzero

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I don't find the reviews of it being light colored and tasteless to be true. I like it a lot more than the roasted dandelion teas I have had.
customer_reviews.author: K Ventimiglia

customer_reviews.title: Best Dandelion Root Tea Online - So delicious.
customer_reviews.text: So healthy and very cleansing! Plus, it's 100% organic and made with raw dandelion root tea. No wonder this is a best seller. Their customer support is also fantastic. I decided to subscribe to monthly deliveries because its really helping with my digestion and improving my health overall.
customer_reviews.author: amabosque

customer_reviews.title: Bad Packaging  Do Not Purchase.
customer_reviews.text: The Tea seems OK, However, the packaging of the bags is not. You have to be very careful when u open the individual packaging for each tea bag otherwise the tea bag gets damaged and leaks its contents. This is the ONLY tea bag that I have ever had this problem with, so it is not me but it is the manufacturer. Poor packaging, OK product. Follow up ,,, finally finished with the box, will never purchase again. If you remember how poor the packaging is and have a few extra minutes to open, you can sometimes not rip the bag. Horrible packaging, Amazon should be embarassed.
customer_reviews.author: nmmike

customer_reviews.title: I was not impressed...
customer_reviews.text: I've been drinking dandelion tea for a little while now, but wanted to try this brand because it came in bulk and was cheaper. It's cheaper because it isn't as effective. To the point that I'm not sure it's even dandelion tea. The taste is off, but I could totally let that go considering it is a different brand, but the effects are not there. Nothing. None of the positive digestive effects I had with the previous dandelion teas happen when I use this tea. It's as if I just drank water. I tried to return, but found that this item is not eligible for return. I definitely do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: The best for belly fat and skin issues.
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered this tea numerous times and have recommended it to my clients. It helps with belly fat, skin issues in adults and teens due to hormones, as well as psoriasis inflammation from my own experience and feedback I have received. The taste is amazing compared to other dandelion teas I have tried. LOVE!
customer_reviews.author: Sue Flay

customer_reviews.title: I'd call this 'Happy Tea.'
customer_reviews.text: While this tea probably cures nothing, it is soothing to me. The way it feels, it might truly be at least somewhat anti-inflammatory. And it tastes good! (I didn't expect that, lol.) I do mix it with green tea/kombucha, they taste great together. Since it has no caffeine, I can drink it anytime, which is a bonus to me. The tea bag itself bursts open at the slightest touch, but that doesn't seem to be a problem--even the tiny bits taste good. If it is truly raw, that's healthier than the roasted types, according to my doctor. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Risk

customer_reviews.title: Amazing taste and great benefits for your health!
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely amazed by this tea. It helps my digestive system and the taste is fantastic. I have ordered several 5-packs of this tea already, and I will continue to do so probably forever. I highly recommand this tea, if you have digestive problems, or just want to detox or do something good for your body. I rarely give such a great review and purchase a product this often!
customer_reviews.author: Betty Boo

customer_reviews.title: Happy Liver...Happy Life
customer_reviews.text: Great liver detox and good for those who do not like to use pills or want to give their liver a break. For this elf us who don't have time to make and use the castor oil packs, which are amazing, this is a good alternative. I use these once a day after dinner and it helps me to relax. I noticed a difference (more relaxed and sleeping a little better) after about a week of use.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony D

customer_reviews.title: Good flavor if you want to drink whats in the tea bag.
customer_reviews.text: The flavor was great but the tea packaging is terrible. I have 4 bags left to open. Out of the 16 satchels I have opened so far, only one did not have a hole in it. I don't have the patience to strain my tea. It's unfortunate because the flavor was great. I won't buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Young

customer_reviews.title: A Very Nice Blend with Dandelion Leaf and Root
customer_reviews.text: I have needed Dandelion tea for some difficult leg and swelling. Really miserable, and unusual for me, but my age is catching up with me, at going on 75. So, I have tried more than one Dandelion tea, and this one is my favorite. Mainly because of the wonderful blend of Ceylon Cinnamon and Hibiscus that fill out the flavor so nicely. Sometimes I add a mint blend tea bag with that one and it is a favorite, too. But the straight product is best for healing purposes, I believe. It is very pleasant and I enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Loving Life

customer_reviews.title: ...seems to be working...?
customer_reviews.text: I've used the tea as a liver cleanse for about two weeks. Purchasing more now because I gave one box away to a friend with Health issues. One I took to work and another I used up giving the tea to my 90 yr old mother. Her kidneys could use a little TLC. I've seen immediate results with mother. And I think I see the beginnings of improvement in my own health?! Will be able to judge more accurately after a couple more weeks.
customer_reviews.author: L in Philly

customer_reviews.title: Great dandelion tea
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this tea. I got it for my tea drinking hubby-and after I ended up tasting it, loved it myself. We drink it every night and I think it really helps with digestion and gives a feeling of calmness. I ended up getting five more boxes! This dandelion tea has become our favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Bellafelice

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent Quality
customer_reviews.text: I've reviewed this tea favorable in the past, and I've purchased it in bulk about 30 times over the years. I've noticed that every once in a while, I'll receive a delivery of tea in which none of the 500 tea bags in the shipment has any hibiscus. There is no flavor or color. It's pretty awful. This was the case with the last batch of 500 I received, and I'm incredibly disappointed, having just missed their 30-day return window. :P
customer_reviews.author: Nuala

customer_reviews.title: Delicious ritual
customer_reviews.text: This tea is really delicious and I have been enjoying it every night! Somehow I crave it & it really helps me curb my sweet tooth cravings that are pretty much constant...but seem to be less and less lately. This tea turns to a beautiful Fuchsia color once steeped, I am guessing from the hibiscus. The flavor is very yummy- Very soft & mellow, but I can still taste all the difference ingredients, hibiscus & cinnamon :) Love it! Very pleased with this product & I look forward to seeing what else this brand has to offer.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse G

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, but wish the title had stated cinnamon and hibiscus.
customer_reviews.text: (Updated review) I didn't read the full description and accidentally ordered this thinking it was only dandelion root tea without other flavors. The company was very responsive and helpful! As for the tea, while I'm not a fan of cinnamon or hibiscus, those flavors are not overwhelming. In fact, the tea was very mild. I steeped it in boiling water for 10+ minutes and it was a pale pink color with a delicate taste. I could drink it again, but I'll probably give it to someone who will appreciate it more.
customer_reviews.author: SH

customer_reviews.title: It does have a good taste - very light and floral
customer_reviews.text: Just got this tea yesterday. It does have a good taste - very light and floral. The hibiscus and cinnamon in the tea help the flavor. I did feel more energetic and less bloated with the tea after just drinking 2 cups in one day. So far so good. I bought this tea as I read it helps aid in digestion, and good functioning with kidney and livers. I am one who suffers from gastrointestinal issues and I'm open to anything that will help.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh

customer_reviews.title: I do like this tea
customer_reviews.text: I do like this tea. I drink it every day. My commentary is based on packaging only, I was impressed with the immediate response and follow up from Kiss Me Organics, they listen to the customer feedback. Its the packaging, when you open a bag on the designated tear line, be prepared to rip the tea bag some of the time, thus destroying it. I have taken to shaking each teabag hoping to get it away from the tear line and then carefully cutting the pouch opens which is semi successful
customer_reviews.author: Holiday Writes Jana

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Packaging!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this tea because I take a lot of medication and it is hard on my liver. I was hoping to have a way to help my body in a more natural way. When the oackage showed up, I am pretty sure it had been run over by a truck. The box was squished and a couple packets of tea torn open. The flavor of this tea is reminiscent of dirt, but I’m not sure what I expected....it’s Dandelions. A little honey makes it palatable. We will see if it works or not.
customer_reviews.author: Laura W

customer_reviews.title: Bad
customer_reviews.text: I love the tea and I have been ordering from this tea from this company for a long time. In the past, when opening the tea bags it has happened that maybe one or to tea bags are damaged (the string brakes off easily and opens the tea bag or the tea bag comes broken). One or two is easy to over look. The other day however, I got really upset when I opened, no lie 4 tea bags and all 4 were broken. This is not easy to overlook as it already doesn't come with that many tea bags in the box. I am very disappointed to say the least on this last shipment.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Good Tea
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this Raw Dandelion Root tea and some loose leaf peppermint tea...put 1 Dandelion tea bag along with 1 white and 1 green tea bag and 2 heaping teaspoons of peppermint leaves in a 20 ounce mug...let the white & green steep for 4 minutes and removed...let the Dandelion and peppermint leaves steep for another 10 minutes...removed them...added some Maple syrup...stirred and YUM!!!...Dandelion root for my Liver...White and Green tea for lots of antioxidants...Maple syrup for vitamins and minerals plus a touch of sweetness and peppermint for a pop...Good Stuff Hot or Cold.
customer_reviews.author: AT,GA

customer_reviews.title: She says it tastes great and drinks it almost everyday
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mother who is having some renal issues. She says it tastes great and drinks it almost everyday. Her only complaint is that every bag has a little slit in it releasing the contents when she brews her cup of tea, its a pain to find another bag or filter for her but she loves the tea and is willing to work around it.
customer_reviews.author: E Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Impressive, used for several issues
customer_reviews.text: Husband had a really bad bout of indigestion from taking a pain pill. He was really uncomfortable. He tried a ginger pill, Tums. Both worked only a little. I gave him this tea and it worked instantly he said. It got things moving and he released the trapped gas within about 15 minutes of drinking. I used this tea for a HORRIBLE hangover, and it made me feel much better after vomiting! Although for hangovers, it doesn’t beat Drinkade (all natural btw) but I could use both even to really kick a bad hangover’s a$$. Great for digestion, soothing stomach (especially after vomiting) and a decent flavor, thanks to the hibiscus. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: M Eva

customer_reviews.title: but it is good product. Will buy again and don't know why ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this to detox liver and mix it with sleeptime tea and take it before I go to bed. I have not tried tea without adding others, but it is good product. Will buy again and don't know why they cannot deliver dandelion tea bags to CALIFORNIA but this can be delivered doesn't make mush sense.. some people need to concentrate on bigger issues in this world then dandelion tea and valerian root.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Like dishwater
customer_reviews.text: Terrible taste. Actually no taste and faint color. Would not buy again. Roasted dandelion root is much tastier.
customer_reviews.author: New York Real

customer_reviews.title: Tea is great...leaky bags though
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this tea & that perhaps those that ordered it prior and experienced the contents of the bad coming out into the tea upon adding water were a corrected production issue. The taste is amazing so two stars but honestly if I had time to prepare loose tea I would have bought it in bulk somewhere. Now I know to remove the tea and place it into a strainer ball from the start. I hope given the volume of consumers documenting this issue that they actually correct it. I will not purchase again and will try a new manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: YUSUF

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting tea!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know about the reviews and questions stating that this tea is flavorless and very faint colored. That is absolutely not my experience. I'm getting very rich color and flavor. The tea has a great taste. I really enjoy drinking it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tea!
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived on time and in perfect condition. I didn’t have any trouble at all with the tea bags, as some folks have complained about. They come out of their individual pouches easily and intact, no problem. The taste of this tea is fantastic! I’m not usually a fancy tea guy and hate the fruity flavors, but this stuff, with the dandelion, cinnamon and hibiscus flavors is an excellent blend. Very nice. I bought this to help a “water flow” problem and it works as some folks have suggested. It took awhile, but once I started peeing, I was going pretty regularly for several hours, at least. I like it! I’ll buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Gregshock

customer_reviews.title: Looks like poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: I had an issue with bag quality a while ago but Kiss Me followed up and made it right. I have not had any problems with this product since and I very much enjoy the product. I was impressed with the way they handled my complaint and am now a loyal customer.
customer_reviews.author: DandDRo

customer_reviews.title: Mixed feelings
customer_reviews.text: The first time drinking, I gently opened the single serve envelope and the bag ripped open. No worries I will use a loose tea strainer. The 2nd, 3rd...OK, everytime the string comes off, the bag pops open, it doesn't matter what I do the bags come apart with loose tea everywhere. I use the loose tea strainer everytime because I have to. Now, the flavor of the tea is excellent. Exactly, the flavor I like after 5 to 6 minutes of steeping--two bags for 12 ounces. So the product tastes great they just went very cheap on processing the tea bags.
customer_reviews.author: Mark R

customer_reviews.title: Bags aren't sealed! Strings aren't attached. Big mess!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this tea before with no problem. Received the two boxes I ordered Monday. I opened one packet and tea spilled everywhere. I opened a second packet and same thing. The bags are poorly sealed or not sealed all the way. Love the tea but don't think I'll order this brand again. UPDATE 2/20 Every bag in the box was unsealed and the strings come right out. Won't be ordering this brand again. Found another that's a little more expensive but very well packaged and got two cups from the same teabag.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Had issues but KissMeOrganics is committed to their customers
customer_reviews.text: Had a problem with packaging but they were commitment to making it right. Been drinking this tea for a few months now. I plan on expanding on this review in the future. For now I will say dandelion root is hard to like but this one adds cinnamon and hibiscus and that does help with the flavor. I have had just plain raw dandelion root tea and it's hard for me to drink down. Maybe they harvest a better crop of dandelions or its the cinnamon and hibiscus.
customer_reviews.author: Evil Bucket

customer_reviews.title: wheres the dandelion root
customer_reviews.text: This is a tea that is made for people that want everything to taste floral. It is very lightweight, I am sorry that I purchased it as it was available in 5 pack at the time I purchased. I am disappointed and will not order this tea again, a waste of money. I drink straight dandelion root tea and it brews much darker and has a much fuller flavor. This is like drinking colored water. Lesson learned if I can;t but just one, there may be a reason they are only selling in larger packs: to dump product that doesn't sell well. Won't purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Petunia

customer_reviews.title: defective bags
customer_reviews.text: ***Update*** After posting this, the seller reached out and made everything right. So a lesson for all, even if it says that the item isn't available for return, it's worth the effort to ask. Great job to the seller! Please take note that this item is not eligible for return (I missed that after I bought multiple boxes). The seam of the bag isn't sealed properly, so the tea comes floating out into your cup. I don't much like to have to floss my teeth after a sip. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Tasty
customer_reviews.text: I have always wanted to try dandelion tea but never got around to making some so when I saw that this tea was organic and made from raw dandelion, I decided to try it. It was more for my health so I wasn’t expecting it to taste very good. What a nice surprise that turned out to be very tasty! There is added hibiscus which I love and think it gives a sweet floral taste. I will be purchasing more soon. Also my hands have less inflammation but I can’t say it’s only because of the tea. Give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent taste
customer_reviews.text: Silly me but I didn't check the ingredients before I ordered. I opened the box and made a cup of tea. I've had Roasted Dandelion tea before so when I took my first sip I quickly checked the box. Instead of the earthy flavor of Roasted Dandelion, it was a bit fruity with a slight taste of cinnamon. What a pleasant surprise! It is an amazing blend of Raw Dandelion for my digestion, Hibiscus for my blood pressure and Cinnamon that helps regulate my blood sugar. Love, love, love this tea. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Emary

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good, poor packaging and empty teabags
customer_reviews.text: The tea tastes good and was pleasant to drink. The problem is in the packaging process. I’ve had some empty tea packs and a lot of tea bags that would rip open due to they kinda were glued/attached to the sides. So I’d go to pull it out and had a mess everywhere. Then there were others that where you tear at the top it was too close and you would end up ripping the tea back as well. It wouldn’t be a big deal if it was here and there. But it was more often than not. Maybe I got a bad set of boxes?
customer_reviews.author: James U.

customer_reviews.title: So Happy I found you!
customer_reviews.text: Since being furloughed during the COVID-19 pandemic, not being able to go to the gym due to California mandates, and feeling not quite 100% in general, I went on a "bloat" diet (I highly recommend Kefir smoothies!). Because the diet recommends Dandelion Root Tea, I went straight to Amazon and found you! All told, I'm feeling much better, cleansed of toxins, and losing a little weight as well. The tea is wonderful: flavorful and with good body, and the bonus is you can practically feel your kidneys and liver flushing daily. In addition, I actually think it's helping with my stomach issues. Count me in as a regular customer!
customer_reviews.author: Cindi Dewey

customer_reviews.title: I didn't like the flavor
customer_reviews.text: I don't think anything can mask the flavor of dandelion root which is a very earthy deep flavor that I don't particularly like I don't like hibiscus very much I find it to be rather tart.... and I love cinnamon but I didn't really taste the cinnamon the Hibiscus and the cinnamon did not mask the flavor of the Dandy lion I didn't realize it had the other ingredients in it and I don't think it would have made a difference I just don't like dandelion root tea I prefer actually to harvest my own from my garden and I get along with dandy-lion just fine but I just don't like it when I purchase it.
customer_reviews.author: HYPNOJADE

customer_reviews.title: Wow!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I was amazed that this tea tastes good. It has a beautiful lilac color when brewed. A lite fruity scent. A pleasant taste, without adding anything. I haven't tried with sweetened as I prefer unsweetened tea. I bought to aid in detox of kidneys and liver. My kidney function numbers went from the low 50's to the mid 60's after using this a couple days a week for a couple weeks. I will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Mz Juicy

customer_reviews.title: Packaging
customer_reviews.text: While I like this tea flavor and benefits the (individual tea bags) packaging leaves me irritated. I bought two boxes of 20 bags. So far I have used almost an entire box. You have to be very gentle and careful when opening the individual sachets (tea bags). Three of the twenty the tea bag ripped as I pulled on the package. Two bags I stapled the tear so I could use but the third bag basically shredded as I pulled the opening strip across!!
customer_reviews.author: B. Gundy

customer_reviews.title: BEST TASTING HEALTHY TEA EVER
customer_reviews.text: Healthy, stomach soothing tea with no bitterness. I used to dislike tea until I found this combo. I had swollen lymph nodes one day--feeling a cold coming on-- and after drinking the tea they disappeared later in the day. Magic? Coincidence? doesn't matter I'm hooked! TRY IT, YOU WILL NOT BE DISAPPOINTED!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn J Green

customer_reviews.title: Great tea!
customer_reviews.text: So far this stuff seems great! I use it in a detox drink with lemon juice and cranberry juice and I’ve lost 1 pound a day so far! The taste is very mild. I was afraid that the cinnamon would be too strong but it’s not. It will make you urinate a lot! But that means it’s working.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: WTF
customer_reviews.text: First let me say the tea is not bad, the reason for my low rating is the bags. So far I have a 50 percent failure rate with the bags falling apart most of the time before I can even get it in the cup.
customer_reviews.author: FR

customer_reviews.title: Tea is good / Individual Packaging is not
customer_reviews.text: The tea is good... the individual packaging needs to be re-engineered. The bottom of the tea bag is so close to the tear strip that I have ruined about 4 tea bags trying to open the package. The first one I opened like any other tea bag and was shocked when I pulled the tea bag out and the contents went everywhere. I have since then opened very slowly and carefully after the first incident, but still have managed to tear 3 more tea bags. It’s unavoidable. Occasionally I get lucky and not tear it.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice product...
customer_reviews.text: Taste pretty good. In another 5-10-20-30 years (lets see how long I live) I'll attempt to post whether or not it fulfills certain medicinal purposes I read it possibly could do. I do believe my heartburn/bloated feeling seems to felt better after a cup of the Dandelion Root Tea?
customer_reviews.author: stig1111

customer_reviews.title: Tea Is Great But Packaging Terrible! Bags Fall Apart  When Opening And In Your Cup!.
customer_reviews.text: This Tea is great , but the packages rip when you try to get them out of the sealed packets because they are too close to the end of the packet. Also the pull strings fall off some times and the bags disintegrate and particle go into your cup making it undrinkable. LIpton tea bags they ain't! I have to buy cup filter paper to strain the broken bags into another cup. Too bad they charge a lot for a weed bag that falls apart!
customer_reviews.author: J. Gerhardt

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tea!!  Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: A friend who also has kidney disease from diabetes told me that after drinking this tea for a while, all of his kidney function blood work numbers got better! Since I have kidney disease also, I decided to try it. I was skeptical about how it would taste, but I love it!! I haven't had blood work yet, so i do't know if it's helping my kidneys, but i enjoy drinking it anyway, so I'll stick with it! The tea bags come individually wrapped, so i like that, since it keeps it fresher.
customer_reviews.author: nv2

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this tea
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this tea. I have been buying the 5-pack so I can give it out to my friends to try. They love it also. The best part of it all is that within a month my blood pressure readings have significantly gone down!!!!!!!! My doctor couldn't believe it.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Pagano

customer_reviews.title: Most Delicious Dandelion Tea Cups/Hands Down!
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely the best-tasting tea. My daughter and I have tried varied brands of this same variety and there is honestly no comparison. The huge difference is the bitterness that other brands have, in contrast, "Raw Organic" literally has a most amazing flavor without any hint of bitterness. That being said, it is organic paired with a reasonable price with the Subscribe and Save feature we pay only $7.19 for a 20 count pack. I know prices have slightly increased, but so has everything else, whether organic or not. Wise to choose a product that you know is healthy, organic and tastes amazing! Excellent tea!
customer_reviews.author: Thinker

customer_reviews.title: OK if You Want to Strain Tea
customer_reviews.text: I liked the product but 4 out of first box of 20 I used were okay. The other 16 had seams that were not sealed part of the way and I ended up with a lot of extra tea leaves. I had to strain every time I made a batch of this product. I haven't used the other 5 boxes yet. It is time consuming after steeping 15 minutes to strain. If I had known it was going to be like that I would opted for loose tea which usually is less expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Parramore

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this tea! It tastes great and I find that if I drink a cup after dinner it helps keep me regular. I have IBS and I have been looking for natural remedies to alliveate my symptoms. This tea is a game changer :)
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Ciffone

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent
customer_reviews.text: First box I bought was amazing ! So much flavor !!! This second box the box came damaged which I overlooked cause the tea inside was fine. These tea bags a few spilled but I still was like ok I’ll work with this ! WOW The flavor on this batch was non existent. Nothing !!!! Very very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: I can't get over the taste
customer_reviews.text: My friend recommended this to help with adrenal fatigue. I don't know if it works because I can't get over the taste. I have added honey, milk (yes milk tastes good in tea), and sugar. Nothing helps the flavor. I need to put on my big girl pants and drink it!! I'm tired all the time. Even when I get 8 hours of sleep I'm still tired. It's pitiful. I'm glad I wrote this review. It's really made me want to give this nasty drink another shot in hopes it will help with my fatigue. I''ll update the review then.
customer_reviews.author: L.F

customer_reviews.title: Good evening. I purchased this tea from Amazon and ...
customer_reviews.text: Good evening. I purchased this tea from Amazon and honestly wasn't expecting to see or feel much of a difference. Well I was wrong and this is only my third day. First I was pleasantly surprised at the smoothness of the tea and the mild taste. I definitely eliminated more water than usual and I felt less pressure on my abdomen after one cup. Im still undecided on whether or not I want to drink it in the morning or at night like Ive been doing but either way I LOVE THIS TEA! Thank you for a great product P.S. I noticed lots more teas on your site and will be ordering
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: My first order of this product was perfect i received 5box shipment all boxes GREAT
customer_reviews.text: My first order of this product was perfect i received 5box shipment all boxes GREAT! My 2nd order however was a huge disappointment again i received 5boxs only this time each box had at least have of the tea bags were open with grounds spilling every where huge DISAPPOINTMENT!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good customer service
customer_reviews.text: Update: the companies Customer Service contacted me several times to help correct any problems. They were more than helpful. Original review: Be careful when tearing open the tea packet. Each packet has the notches of where to tear BUT you will tear the teabag too. I learned this after tearing 3 teabags & made a mess in my counter. Tea? Ok, I guess. Will try another brand next time.
customer_reviews.author: KayeKayRN

customer_reviews.title: Its tea, pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I've never been much of a tea drinker, so I don't have a whole lot to compare this to. However, after reading the benefits, I decided to try it out. It's only been a few days, and overall the taste is fine but it's too soon to notice any health improvements. People complained of the teabags falling apart, so I make sure to open them carefully and out of 11 so far, only one ripped open. It's not a big deal just open them with care. Overall, I do like it. I just add honey to make it taste better lol.
customer_reviews.author: michele

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Control
customer_reviews.text: I like the tea a lot. My reason for the low stars is because the last 2 times I have purchased it, the quality of packaging has been bad. The tea bags are not sealed on one side. The first time it happened with all 5 boxes in my order, I thought it was a rare occurrence but, now, several months later, it has happened again. The tea particles go all over my counter & floor or throughout the water that I'm trying to make tea in. I make large batches of tea at a time with a pitcher that holds 10+ cups of tea so it ruins the whole batch.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAddict

customer_reviews.title: Should it look like pink water?
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if I got a bad batch or what but when I steep my tea bags the water turns pink! I have never had dandelion tea and didn't know if it was suppose to be a pink color or not so I Googled it and didn't find anywhere that says it should have a pink tint to it. So I didn't drink the tea, tried another bag, steeped it longer and same results; pink tinted water. At this point I'm scared to drink it because it's not even the right color. I'm going to see if I can send it back because at this point I have just wasted money because I'm not drinking it.
customer_reviews.author: The King and Queen

customer_reviews.title: Kudos to Kiss Me Organics
customer_reviews.text: As I wrote before, the tea is great and we enjoy drinking it every day for the past few weeks. The only complaint I had was a couple of empty bags in the box. It turns out Kiss Me Organics actually reads the reviews and not only reads but also tries to rectify the problems clients may have with it. They came through for me (thank you Meghan) and it was a very pleasant experience. Great company that stands behind their products, highest regards :)
customer_reviews.author: PeterC

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT do any detoxing but an okay cup of tea
customer_reviews.text: Okay, I bought this tea thinking that it was going to do something. I like tea to begin with, but I thought this tea was going to at least do what it says, which is detoxing. Well, I am NOT surprise that it is all marketing gimmicks and lies as I read and watched an herbalist stating most items that stated "detox" is just to get the money but they do NOT work! I am still waiting to see what the detoxifying result is or will be. Anyways, I'll just drink it as a regular tea, but there's NOTHING detoxing!!
customer_reviews.author: Lani Vee

customer_reviews.title: Helpful and flavorful
customer_reviews.text: It actually tastes great. This was much easier to take than health food store medicinal tea, which had a strong licorice flavor. I felt refreshed and less bloated later in the day, which is saying a lot. Not sure if it was from this tea, but my constant side spasm pain when sleeping on that side is gone. Looking forward to seeing what other benefits it may have. So glad I found this as a one-day delivery product to add to my order.
customer_reviews.author: Gina C.

customer_reviews.title: Great tea!
customer_reviews.text: Hi Tucker, I received the last order of my beloved dandelion root tea which was 3 boxes. Two of the boxes had been cut with what looked like a knife. The cuts had even penetrated the bags inside the boxes, so there was loose tea everywhere. I LOVE YOUR TEA and will continue to purchase it and enjoy it, and will hope for a closer inspection by your quality control team. THANK YOU. Santanafan
customer_reviews.author: SantanaFan

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Smooth and Delicious
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit that I was pleasantly surprised by this tea. It has a much smoother and slightly sweeter taste than I was anticipating. It's very good-tasting, enough that I had two servings the first time trying it.
customer_reviews.author: pixelshopper

customer_reviews.title: It's Tea
customer_reviews.text: The flavor is very light but its tea. If you want it stronger add two bags. The bags aren't the best but I have a metal tea steeper so I put the bags inside that. The sting is going to pull completely out of the bag if you try the dipping method with your bag. So I'd advise to get a steeper so your cup isn't full of tea leaves.
customer_reviews.author: Tabatha Harris

customer_reviews.title: Helps with digestion
customer_reviews.text: A hot cup of this tea in the morning it how I start my day. Since I have digestive problems, I find that this flavorful tea helps calm my stomach and prevents the bloat I some times get. I have been buying this tea for a couple of years now and make sure I do not run out of it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Birmingham

customer_reviews.title: Product Taste Like Any Tea, NO Bitterness.
customer_reviews.text: Love The Product! No bitter taste what so ever. Amazon Driver Delivery Person, needs to follow "DELIVERY INSTRUCTIONS ON ACCOUNT AND ON OUR RING DOORBELL", which she never even paid attention to. This is the 2nd Delivery Driver Complaint within 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Eliza J

customer_reviews.title: Made me Pee ALOT!
customer_reviews.text: It was recommended to my husband and I from his uncle. I dont drink the stuff but one night my husband "accidentally" made me one. I was peeing all night. I thought I was pregnant or something. (Mental note: get husband back for that) I'm not sure what it actually does but the husband has been doing well since he started using this. He isnt constantly complaining about having stomach issues. so thats a good thing :)
customer_reviews.author: RStacho

customer_reviews.title: Watery and Unflavorful!
customer_reviews.text: I used to love this tea! The cinnamon and hibiscus were a nice touch and the tea was always slightly sweet with a deep red tinge. I could always smell the aroma and it was so flavorful. The order I just received is awful. Something has changed with the formula and the tea steeps almost clear, with no flavor, even after using boiling water as instructed. Amazon wouldn’t let me return it, but gave me a refund for a defective product. Will sadly NOT be purchasing this again.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline77

customer_reviews.title: Liver detox - reduced persistent bloating
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this tea for my overall health. The first couple days of drinking this made my bloating disappear. This will be a staple to my diet now to help with detoxing and cleansing my liver. I did experience some detox symptoms like acne and fatigue for about a couple weeks after starting this but for me that shows that this is working. Love this tea!
customer_reviews.author: Smoon

customer_reviews.title: Nice flavor
customer_reviews.text: This tea has a nice flavor. I have it before going to bed and it has a calming effect and settles my stomach. I gave it four stars because it is sometimes hard to open without tearing the top of the tea bag, even with a scissors it can be difficult. I steep it even with the broken bag, then use a fine strainer to pour it into another cup. I will continue to purchase it, but please lower the teabag in its package just a slight bit!
customer_reviews.author: Sally Summers

customer_reviews.title: Good detox properties
customer_reviews.text: Naturopath wants me to drink this tea for its liver detox properties. Tastes good and is now part of my morning routine. The reason for four stars is because three of the tea bags weren't fully sealed during manufacturing and the contents of the tea bag wound up in my mug the second that I poured the water in. Straining couldn't save it. The tea is a bit pricey, but even more so if you factor in the fact that I couldn't use three bags.
customer_reviews.author: mkkkcgall

customer_reviews.title: Overpackaging and tea bag breakage spoil a fine product
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality tea that helped me overcome some mild kidney pain. At the same time, the overpackaging (individual foil packets) and poorly constructed tea bags knock off a star. Even when I open the packet VERY carefully, at least one in 8 of the bags has a defect that allows the tea to fall out. For these reasons, I'll be saving these bags only for travel while using another brand of bulk (loose) dandelion root.
customer_reviews.author: ArizonaTraveler

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought a single box a few months ago and I absolutely LOVED this tea. So I felt confident buying a 5 pack. I'm a little disappointed with it though. I'm not sure if I just got a weird box or what, but the string comes out of the tea bag during steeping almost every single time. Also, the flavor and color don't seem as full as the single box which is frustrating because I loved those things about my first box so much.
customer_reviews.author: Happymama

customer_reviews.title: Dandelion Taste
customer_reviews.text: The tea taste a bit tart (for a lack of better words) but I am enjoying the product so far. As of to-date, I have not seen any major benefits; outside of the fact that I just like drinking tea......but then again, I am not sure if I would as I still believe it's too early to assess such. I purchased this product, as I heard of its benefits and decided to try it out. I know this is not a lot of information, but this is the best I could provide at this point!
customer_reviews.author: Terrica

customer_reviews.title: Not sure 🤔
customer_reviews.text: I really like the taste of this tea. I fast everyday and I can drink this plain and not add anything to it. The reason I gave it four stars is because I thought it was a detox to help cleanse you out to go to the bathroom but this doesn’t make me go. I was looking for an detox tea to help me go to the bathroom. Not sure if I will keep ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: If You're Looking for A New Drink, This Is it!
customer_reviews.text: I read everywhere that dandelion tea was bitter, but the benefits were so great I decided to try it. I was quite surprised. This blend of the tea is quite nice. I love the taste. I was looking for something to replace coffee and I think I have found it. I have at least two cups a day, sometimes three. The taste is great!
customer_reviews.author: Iviann

customer_reviews.title: I want my money back.
customer_reviews.text: I missed that the tea contains cinnamon. Its not listed until the bottom of product description. I am allergic and there are no return policies for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Candice Boettcher

customer_reviews.title: ~ Great Detox. I like mine with a dash of local raw honey. Nice product. ~
customer_reviews.text: Nice Organic Dandelion Root Tea. I like mine with just a dash of local raw honey. I brew it a bit longer for maximum detox. Expiration date is about a year and a half out, which is plenty of time to enjoy this tea. Amazon is definitely the place to get this tea. Great and simple detoxifying ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Small~Town~Girl

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and effective
customer_reviews.text: I have been enjoying this tea since the moment I recieved it! Already beginning to feel the difference! I'm much less bloated, gassy and uncomfortable. I've had stomach issues all my.life. the flavor is fantastic, I dont sweeten it all. I brew it with a green tea bag in the morning for a little caffeine kick. I'm sure I'll be updating this as time goes on.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Wofford

customer_reviews.title: Good for you and tasty!
customer_reviews.text: I originally got this product as part of a liver cleanse. Every morning I was supposed to drink a detox tea. I was very leery because I'm not a tea drinker outside of the "southern cold iced tea". I've always heard that dandelion was really good for you but I wasn't sure I could get past the taste so I only ordered one box. The first morning I made my first cup and prepared myself for having to just gag it down but to my surprise, it was really good! I love the hibiscus in it. I liked it so much I ordered another 3 boxes!
customer_reviews.author: by Donna Santini

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT ORGANIC TEA!
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed this tea. I have fatty liver and I also wondered if it would make me urinate. Well the tea has a soft taste, not bitter strong like some. And YES, it releases much water from my body. I urinated a few times. I really like this tea. Happy I bought it. I use to use another but the taste of this is not horribly bitter. And it tastes good and made me lose water. So guys try it. You may like it.
customer_reviews.author: Christine H Leone

customer_reviews.title: Good taste. Great effects.
customer_reviews.text: This tea has made me feel great. It's aiding in my weight loss journey and tastes good with my pyure sugar less sweetener. Will be purchasing more of this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Mab

product_meta.title: Dandelion Root Tea Detox Tea - Raw Organic Vitamin Rich Detox - 1 Pack (20 Bags, 2 grams each) - Naturally Supports Overall Health
feature_bullets: RAW DANDELION ROOT - This dandelion root tea is raw not roasted to preserve beneficial enzymes and improve the bioavailability of vital minerals and vitamins.
ORGANIC AND DELICIOUS - Our Dandelion Root Tea is 100% organic and flavored with ceylon cinnamon and hibiscus, which are not only delicious but also provide health benefits
RICH IN VITAMINS AND MINERALS - Dandelion root contains vitamins, minerals, and antioxidants, and essential fatty acids that aid in body wellness
DETOX TEA - Our Dandelion Root Tea aids in body detox, such as for digestion and nutrient absorption
NATURALLY CAFFEINE-FREE - Made from raw dandelion root, hibiscus and Ceylon cinnamon and naturally caffeine-free so you can enjoy it if you are caffeine sensitive.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
